info.name: finan_22_verify_to_delete_transaction_linked_invoice
info.description:
### Testsuite: Verify to delete transaction linked with invoice

###### Testcase:

1. Login with owner account
2. Get data
    1. Account coa / Get list coa => get debit account
    2. Transaction / Get list transaction => get total transaction, get transaction need delete
    3. Account cash_n_bank / Get list account => get list credit
    4. \[2.c include invoice\] \[New\] payment / get list payment => get total payment & get payment matching with this transaction at case 2.c.
    5. \[2.c include invoice\] Invoice / Get list invoice => get invoice linked with this transaction
    6. Posting / Get list posting => get total posting
    7. Report / Get report cash_flow => has change with tnx (confirm with PO)
    8. Report / Get report account => get data
    9. Report / Get report account receivable paid => get data
    10. Report / Get report account receivable unpaid => get data
    11. \[2.c include invoice\] Report / Get report account receivable customer => get data respective with invoice at 2.c.
    12. \[2.c include invoice\] Report / Get report account receivable invoice => get data respective with 2.c
    13. \[2.c include invoice\] Home / todo / invoice overdue => get data
    14. Home / account balance / account lifetime => get data
    15. Home / cash flow / cash flow period => get data
    16. Home / profit n loss / profit n loss period => get data
    17. Home / receivable account / receivable payable => get data
3. Delete transaction
    1. Bank => error
    2. VA => error
    3. Manual => ok
4. Check data
    1. Transaction / Get list transaction => decrease 1
    2. Transaction / Get transaction detail => Not found
    3. \[2.c include invoice\] \[New\] payment / get list payment => decrease 1
    4. \[2.c include invoice\] \[New\] payment / get payment detail => Not found
    5. Account cash_n_bank / Get list account => check respective banlance_amount
    6. \[2.c include invoice\] Invoice / Get list invoice => data updated
    7. \[2.c include invoice\] Invoice / Get invoice detail => data updated
    8. \[2.c include invoice\] Payment / Get list payment => data updated
    9. \[2.c include invoice\] Payment / Get payment detail => data updated
    10. Posting / get list posting => data updated
    11. Report / Get report cash_flow => data updated
    12. Report / Get report account => data updated
    13. Report / Get report account receivable paid => update data
    14. Report / Get report account receivable unpaid => update data
    15. \[2.c include invoice\] Report / Get report account receivable customer => update data
    16. \[2.c include invoice\] Report / Get report account receivable invoice => update data
    17. \[2.c include invoice\] Home / todo / invoice overdue => check data
    18. Home / account balance / account lifetime => check data
    19. Home / cash flow / cash flow period => check data
    20. Home / profit n loss / profit n loss period => check data
    21. Home / receivable account / receivable payable => check data

###### Note:

- Account sẽ không có số liệu về amount, phần check balance_amount cần thực hiện ở các API về report
- debit account: payment for invoice
